labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Nothing. It acts as if you didn't click on anything.
data.expected_result: The current date should appear in the search box and allow you to continue typing other search arguments.
data.short_description: Cannot select the current date in the date picker for the search bar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the search bar - Type "before:", "after:", or "during:" - On the calendar that appears, click the current date
